Directions: In a skillet, brown pork chops on both sides in butter. Transfer to a small greased baking dish; sprinkle with onion. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over chops. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Ingredients: 2 (3/4 inch) thick bone-in pork loin chops
